participant_1.background:
My previous job was as a seamstress, and I used to love creating custom quilts for my customers.
I care about social media enough to stay connected with my friends but not enough to let it take over my life.
I live in my hometown right now, but I'm planning to move to Australia in the future.
I won a bowling tournament last year, and my CD collection is still safe.
I like cheeseburgers and doing laundry on weekends.

participant_2.background:
I miss my parents a lot.
i have blue and orange hair.
I went to the Amazon rainforest with my older brother and saw monkeys in the wild.
my friends do not call my by my real name.
I grew up with my little sister in a small town in the Midwest.

content.text: Hello, nice to meet you! I'm from the Midwest, how about you?
Nice to meet you too! I grew up in the Midwest, but I moved to the west coast for college.
I wanted to experience a new part of the country and I got a scholarship to go to school here.
That's awesome! What's your favorite thing about the west coast?
I love the mountains and the ocean. It's so beautiful here.
I bet! I've always wanted to go to the mountains.
You should! It's so peaceful and relaxing.
I will! Maybe I'll take a trip out there after I graduate.
That would be awesome! You should let me know if you do.
I will! What do you miss most about the Midwest?
My family and friends. I miss them a lot.
I bet! I miss my family too.
But I'm happy here. I love my new life.
